00024 static void ob_j(void* par,
00025                  const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00026                  const GaussianAux* X, complex double j[3])
00027 {
00028   int i;
00029 
00030   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00031     j[i] += X->T* ((X->rho[(i+1)%3]*X->pi[(i+2)%3]-
00032                     X->rho[(i+2)%3]*X->pi[(i+1)%3])* X->S* X->R +
00033                0.5*X->sig[i]*X->R);
00034 }

00037 static void gob_j(void* par,
00038                   const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00039                   const GaussianAux* X, gradGaussianAux* dX,
00040                   complex double* jx, gradGaussian* djx)
00041 {
00042   // to be rewritten
00043 
00044   complex double rhoxpi;
00045   int i;
00046 
00047   rhoxpi = X->rho[1]*X->pi[2] - X->rho[2]*X->pi[1];
00048 
00049   *jx += X->T* (rhoxpi*X->S + 0.5*X->sig[0])* X->R;
00050 
00051   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00052     djx->chi[i] += X->T* (rhoxpi*dX->dS.chi[i] + 0.5*dX->dsig.chi[i][0])* X->R;
00053   djx->a += X->T* ((dX->drho.a[1]*X->pi[2] + X->rho[1]*dX->dpi.a[2] -
00054                     dX->drho.a[2]*X->pi[1] - X->rho[2]*dX->dpi.a[1])*X->S*X->R+
00055                    (rhoxpi*X->S + 0.5*X->sig[0])* dX->dR.a);
00056   djx->b[1] += X->T*(dX->drho.b*X->pi[2] - X->rho[2]*dX->dpi.b)*X->S*X->R;
00057   djx->b[2] += X->T*(X->rho[1]*dX->dpi.b - dX->drho.b*X->pi[1])*X->S*X->R;

00060     djx->b[i] += X->T*(rhoxpi* X->S + 0.5*X->sig[0])*dX->dR.b[i]; 
00061 }

00064 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)
00065 
00066 void calcConstraintJ(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00067                      double* j2)
00068 {
00069   double j[3];
00070   OneBodyOperator op_ob_j = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_j};
00071 
00072   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_j, j);
00073   *j2 = SQR(j[0]) + SQR(j[1]) + SQR(j[2]);
00074 }
